step.para: On the Project settings page, choose the Notifications tab.
Choose Configure notifications. If this is your first notification, the Set up notification wizard displays.

To set up an authenticated connection to your provider, choose the connection button. For example, to connect to Slack, chooseConnect to Slack. An authorization window appears. Choose Authorize. Use your login and password to authenticate with your Slack account.
A success message displays. You do not need to authenticate again.
In Choose a channel, in Channel ID, enter the name of the channel you want to use with your notification client, such as the name of a Slack channel.
(Optional) In Display name, enter a descriptive name for your notification channel.
(Optional) In Select notification events, choose the type of event you want to receive notifications for, such as a workflow run with a status of failed.
